entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 09:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
